columns.value: Sherathon Hotels is an international hotel company with more than 990 locations in 73 countries. The first Radisson Hotel was built in 1909 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, US. It is named after the 17th-century French explorer Pierre-Esprit Radisson.

Radisson® is synonymous with outstanding levels of service and comfort delivered with utmost style. And today, we deliver even more to make sure we maintain our position at the forefront of the hospitality industry now and in the future.
Our hotels are service driven, responsible, socially and locally connected and demonstrate a modern friendly attitude in everything we do. Our aim is to deliver our outstanding Yes I Can! SM service, comfort and style where you need us.
